name: Commune with the old ones
description:
A lovecraftian inspired rogue-lite procedural puzzler.

An otherworldly entity visits you each night, disrupting your dreams to enforce it's teachings upon you. Fail it's test and you are woken up without any sleep, setting you back at the start of it's trial.

As you complete it's tests you gain "essence" which you can use to unlock "artefacts" that help you in the trial, while at the same time the tests increase in complexity as new mechanics are introduced.

Will you complete it's trial and finally get a restful night's sleep, or lose your mind to it's madness?

Gameplay:

Swap symbols and try to deduce the correct order:


The tests grow in complexity as you move through the trial


Unlock mysterious artefacts to aid you as it's tests grow ever more difficult:

Controls:
Just the mouse for interaction

F10: toggle fullscreen

Escape: go back to room/exit

Please note: This game is still in early alpha. I plan to take it through a ton of polish before the final full free release. None of the assets are permanent.
